thread.title: Pats haven't lost a game when Dion Lewis plays
thread.title_full: Pats haven't lost a game when Dion Lewis plays

author: USA TODAY
title: Pats haven't lost a game when Dion Lewis plays
text:
Pats haven't lost a game when Dion Lewis plays Among the positively crazy things about the New England Patriots' epic comeback effort in Super... Post to Facebook Pats haven't lost a game when Dion Lewis plays Among the positively crazy things about the New England Patriots' epic comeback effort in Super...  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/super-bowl-51-new-england-patriots-dion-lewis-undefeated-crazy-stat/   Pats haven't lost a game when Dion Lewis plays Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 12:29 a.m. ET Feb. 6, 2017 
New England Patriots' Dion Lewis answers questions during opening night for the NFL Super Bowl 51 football game at Minute Maid Park Monday, Jan. 30, 2017, in Houston. (AP Photo/Charlie Riedel) ORG XMIT: NFL196 (Photo: AP) 
Among the positively crazy things about the New England Patriots' epic comeback effort in Super Bowl 51 is a quirky fact about running back Dion Lewis. 
After the championship win in Houston, the Patriots have claimed victory in every single game when Lewis was in the lineup. That's right, he's notched 10 wins in 2016 including the Super Bowl and seven in 2015. The Patriots are still undefeated every time Dion Lewis plays. â€” Jamey Eisenberg (@JameyEisenberg) February 6, 2017 
Lewis missed a bunch of contests between those two years thanks to a torn ACL and recovery from subsequent surgery, which means the Pats have lost a few contests without him. 
Just imagine what that must be like for Lewis - when in uniform, he's been a a part of a winning locker room every single time. That's just plain nuts. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/super-bowl-51-new-england-patriots-dion-lewis-undefeated-crazy-stat/ Most Popular
